body: Rendy, To change the construction of a ground floor, you should use the "Set EP Zone Ground Construction" component. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5W1fGMD3XQTTFYD*U0pgVX1IeEhqUvkNzSVYmY0pT*l91ia2lNV4SRjnkbtW1cIrZqFmgUk5Qqnqm*PHtVrmU9UhY*K49EPz/SetEPGrndConstr.PNG) Abraham's method is also good and thank you for posting it, Abraham.  I think this alternative one should be a bit better in that it requires fewer components and is more manageable in cases of a large number of zones. See updated GH file attached. -Chris
